```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gtable)
```

```{r gtable_col, cache = TRUE}
a <- rectGrob(gp = gpar(fill = "red"))
b <- circleGrob()
c <- linesGrob()
gt <- gtable_col("demo", list(a, b, c))
gt
plot(gt)
gtable_show_layout(gt)



```
